column4: Again I ask--and mnaines, feel free not to answer--how can I tell Ubuntu to stop changing my power profile by itself?
how does it change it? (sorry, missed most of the first part of your issue)
Whenever I insert or remove the AC or resume from standby, the power profile changes. It used to go to OnDemand mode, but now it seems to be going to Performance mode.
never heard of that and I'm using a desktop so dont have any clue how to help
